Interface ViolationMetadataRepository

public interface ViolationMetadataRepository
extends oracle.apps.ta.dt.core.injection.Injectable

Contains metadata about audit violations.

Method Detail

isExempt

boolean isExempt(oracle.jdeveloper.audit.analyzer.AuditContext context,
                 java.lang.String ruleId,
                 java.lang.String message)
Must return true if the provided arguments represent an exempt audit violation. Either by filename, violation message, or line number of the current construct from the context.

Parameters:
context -
ruleId -
message - The violation message
Returns:
true if the violation is exempt.

isOjaudit

boolean isOjaudit()
Returns:
true if running from command line ojaudit.

isValid

boolean isValid()
The repository may be backed by network resources which may not always be available.

Returns:
true if the repository is in a valid state.

reset

void reset()
Release any resources as needed
